website_summaries.verdict: A unique take on the original wooden swing, this excellent surfer offers impressive fun for riders of all ages.
pros: Can be used as a simple swing for younger children or an adventurous surf for older riders
Features a unique curved shape for more power and stability
Includes mildew-resistant ropes and adjustable handles for safety
cons: Supervision required for younger children when using

customer_reviews.title: My kids want to go kite surfing now. Thanks a lot...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing. I had to make a rope “Branch” to hang the swing from to put it where I wanted but it made it work even better. Watch the video for more info.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Fun for every age
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge hit. ALL the children and adults love it. It was hung between two trees with a cable. You must order the grips because it is very slippery without them but perfect with the grips. I am goving it four stars only because for safety reasons the swing ahould not be sold without the grips on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Warps with water damage in 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered May 2019. Put up June 2019. Photos taken October 2019. I’d like my $129.00 back.
customer_reviews.author: bravebeal

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, BUT
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea, but very difficult to install properly to get the full effect. If you don't have the perfect branch setup you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Koch

customer_reviews.title: Fun swing.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this thing. We had an arborist do the actual set up to make sure we had a solid branch. This is not a typical swing - the kids can do some over the top maneuvers on it. Bark chips or a soft landing site would be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Swing
customer_reviews.text: My grandchild absolutely loves this! She is 9 and has been on this non stop since we put it up. It is super sturdy; the rope and handles are all included. The only thing I did buy separately was some rubber non slip adhesive patches. They are not included. The swing is high gloss wood and the patches keep the feet from slipping off, or if they use this as a sit on swing they won't slide off. Amazon sells these and they come in multiple colors. It took a minimal amount of time to put it up, just make sure you scope out a good branch first. Grandbaby loves it and so do the little neighbor kids.
customer_reviews.author: Oncology Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic invention, works for older kids to!
customer_reviews.text: What a great toy! The vendor was very prompt and courteous when I had a small concern. It works better with 4 handles. But it got my 18 year old son outside and playing like a kid with his friends. The stunts they do on the swurfer are amazing. They love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bambalam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Activity!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my 12 year daughter's birthday and it has become everyone's favorite toy in our home. It provides productive alone time or social watch me during my turn time. The girl feels on top of the world pumping her body to soaring heights! The install was fairly simple, the design is super smart and sturdy and the handles are easily adjusted for comfort. Our 8, 10, 12, 41 and 50 year old kids ALL love the swurfer! Even grandma swurfed!
customer_reviews.author: YogaLindsay

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. Within 60 days the coating started to bubble and chip away. Within 3-4 months the wood was beginning to weather away and showed signs of wood rot/damage. Sad that a formerly good brand sold out and now the product is so cheaply made. Won’t last more than 6-9 months. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Needs Longer Ropes
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun swing! Good for kids and adults. This is our second Swurfer and I definitely recommend the product. Left our first one behind when selling a home. However- I do wish it came with longer ropes. It comes with (2) 30' ropes which means the tree limb can only be about 15' to 17' off the ground. This is pretty limiting unless you live in the low country with big arching live oak limbs. You are going to need much longer ropes to successfully hang the swing in most conditions. I would say (2) 50' ropes as part of the standard package would make this a much better product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product for the kids
customer_reviews.text: We installed this product on the swingbeam of our swingset, which is about 8 feet high. It's probably designed to be hung from a higher height than this, but it works well, and our 10 year old daughter really enjoys it. The product seems to be of good quality. My only complaint is that it has no grip or traction material on the surface that you stand on--you have to purchase something separately. Considering the price of this item, I think it should include traction material.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Buckwalter

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and glad they already made a central point for you in the ropes! To save money, we just bought a non-skid tape instead of their official one.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old niece loved this gift for her birthday
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old niece loved this gift for her birthday!! As did her mom and all her friends (adult and kid friendly and fun!)
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Bjork

customer_reviews.title: Coolest toy ever invented!!!
customer_reviews.text: This could be the coolest toy ever invented!!! Seriously get it for your kids!!! It’s kept my video game obsessed kid outdoors all summer! It was a bugger to install but once you & your husband almost kill each other it’ll be worth it when you see the joy on your kids face!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Frank

customer_reviews.title: Weatherproof or it won’t last...
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be weatherproofed...this picture is after only one year of being outside on our swing set in Virginia Beach. Had no idea the finish wasn’t weatherproof. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hatchell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesomely awesome!!! Gotta have the right tree though! We bought our own longer rope because our branch was high...makes it REALLY fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bender

customer_reviews.title: What fun!
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to figure out the best spot for it. Since we didn't have a limb long enough, we installed a board and strung the rope through it so it swings perpendicular to the tree trunk. It is lots of fun, and challenging. A good core and thigh workout.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great swing! So fun! Everyone asks about it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best swing ever! My kids use it daily and so do I! My husband even swings on it. If you want to use the surfing feature it needs to be far away from the tree trunk, so consider that when purchasing. How long is the branch you are attaching it to? Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsi

customer_reviews.title: So much family fun
customer_reviews.text: We love, love, love this!!!! Everything you need to hang it is in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa, Fl Momma

customer_reviews.title: Having fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a nervous nelly when it comes to his “safety” and he doesn’t like to do many physical activities. We’ve only had this up for a day and he makes special trips outside to ride it. I’m hoping that he continues to enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: We love the swurfer! We had to hang it pretty high based on available limbs and space. It took a while to get the ropes over the branch and positioned as needed. Otherwise it was easy to assemble and we are very happy with it. The adults and kids use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 8 year old and he loves it. We all get on it to play! My husband had to buy a bunch of cable to be able to hang it since we did not have a good tree to hang it from. Hopefully it holds up well through the summer heat and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Christmas fun!
customer_reviews.text: Given to my grand daughter for Christmas. She loves it. Keeps her busy.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Richards

customer_reviews.title: A standard swing is better
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and install. Disappointed with its function. Not that fun
customer_reviews.author: john lorton

customer_reviews.title: Great swing we're loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this hung for the grandkids on Labor day. It is an instant hit they are loving it. Grandpa and grandma even enjoy it. Finding the right location to hang it is very important.
customer_reviews.author: MV Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I put this up myself. I had to look up how to make the knot on YouTube. It took about an hour from unboxing to playing. Lots of fun. Very sturdy. Great saddlebag workout for us moms! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this Swing
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this Swing! Great Invention!!! Fun for kids or adults!!!! Was a big hit and everyone wants to know where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: luckymom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh this is so much fun, we all are enjoying it, not just our daughter...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea just not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately you really need just the right limb for this to work.... straight enough and sturdy enough and high enough. We ended up removing the board and making 2 hand swings from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was the best toy I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest swurfer My kids love swinging on it I don't like much the yellow color I would like better if it was black But it's still great It's extremely safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Gelbendorf

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and functionality. Everything that was needed was provided. Easy installation and quality material. We are very happy with our purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V.Q.

customer_reviews.title: Family favorite
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren love it. Kindergarten grandchild uses it daily to unwind after school. Said it relaxes her. I often sit and swing for a fun arm workout.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Kids never get bored with this!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 boys and neighbor kids have loved it since we purchased it one year ago. All ages can have fun from our 1.5 yr. old, 4 yr. old and 9 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: CLJONES

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and a good work out!
customer_reviews.text: This swing is a lot of fun but it is work to get it going high! Teens - mature adults have really enjoyed this swing (I'm 62). It does take some coordination, it's not a passive sport. It's fairly easy to adjust for different size people. A strong branch is needed too, the higher the better. One more tip, leave the swing so it's angled if you leave it on the tree, otherwise rain water sits on the board and will likely hasten deterioration.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Munsterman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if it came with longer rope. Pricey for a board and rope. But it’s fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGirl1111

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have the correct style tree limb
customer_reviews.text: need a very specific type of tree to install swing. wish I would have realized that before purchasing. I now cannot return this item and have no use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D Welborn

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!!
customer_reviews.text: This has kept all 4 of my kids busy for hours. Highly recommend it. Great quality and hours of fun. Even I did it!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My six year grandson loves this swing we put up at the cabin. He likes practicing his surfing tricks. Grandma likes to swing normal on it!
customer_reviews.author: GwenT

customer_reviews.title: Used missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts and looks to be used. And now I’m responsible to return it or be out $122.00
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Elizabeth Purves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY COOL...Everyone who sees it wants one! Expensive but worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I have so much fun swinging and swurfing! It was fairly easy to hang and it feels very secure.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lindholm

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, but you need the right tree.
customer_reviews.text: We love the Swurfer! Sturdy and fun to use. The only issue we have had is that where we live, trees that are perfect for setting it up are scarce. We put it up on a playground.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old son. He and his friends enjoy it a lot! The only difficult part was finding the right tree limb and cutting branches so it could swing properly. I would make sure you have the right tree before buying.

customer_reviews.title: Family fun at Nana's house!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome entertainment for each member of our family: 3-71 years!

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My two sons (8 & 5) love this. Installation was easy after watching the video and they don't stop swinging. Highly recommended for kids that need to get some energy out and have fun.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas present. Kids loved it and still enjoying it. Not too difficult to install. Had to find a appropriate tree branch and then instructions were straight forward.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it and it was surprisingly​ easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: It is a blast for everyone.  Not for kids only
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest swing for anybody. My grandkids love it as do I. Quite the work out. Need it for any yard with trees or worth building a platform for it

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the yard!
customer_reviews.text: The kids (ages 8 and 11) love this. They play on it together harmoniously and separately.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: This swing is worth every penny. My kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great active gift.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and my 7 year old grandson has already enjoyed it. It is a great active experience and will grow with him as he gets more confidence with it.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneSC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the coolest swing around! Worth the price as it’s built well and will last for years.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and unique way to swing!
customer_reviews.text: We now have one at home and one at the grandparents house; great fun for both kids and adults!

customer_reviews.title: Really fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really fun. Just installed it and she needs to practice. But it's great!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Thank You for making a Quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Rope was not long enough
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my two grandsons, ages 11 and 4. They love it. An additional rope had to be purchased because the one that came with it was not long enough for the tree that they were securing it to.

customer_reviews.title: They love the swing
customer_reviews.text: We hung this at our farm for our grand kids. They love the swing. Very happy with this purchase. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey. The gift was for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey. The gift was for my daughter and her 2 children. Their ages are 33. 4. and 7 and their birthdays are all the same week. They all use it different ways. Grandaughter swings, grandson surfs thru the air, and daughter uses it to work out. I guess it's a gift for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This has been such a big hit in our front ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a big hit in our front yard. We hung it from a tree and my children swing on it all day. The look on the faces of the people passing by is priceless. Everyone loves this swing!
customer_reviews.author: hambone

customer_reviews.title: Big fun - unique.
customer_reviews.text: We are loving it! It's very fun, though harder than it looks. Good workout. All the teens and tweens love it.

customer_reviews.title: Wooden swing doesn't like TEXAS WEATHER!
customer_reviews.text: For the 10 months that the swing lasted, it was a hit with the kids. But we live in Texas and it's hot and humid and the wooden swing decayed and peeled on the bottom. Not sure if we got 10 months of fun out of the price, but just a warning that this swing should probably not be left outside in humidity or rain...
customer_reviews.author: Texas Warrior Mom

customer_reviews.title: You need the same height of tree as diameter of ...
customer_reviews.text: You need the same height of tree as diameter of use. If you want to swing 30' diameter, you need a 30' high branch, which may be hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 boys!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this! Easy to put up and a blast to use!

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons love this swing
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews, But had to with this item. My grandsons love this swing. We can't keep the two year old off it. He plays on it every day. It was worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product, suits the need very well. Just very expensive for what it is.

customer_reviews.title: Swurfs up!
customer_reviews.text: The kids have more fun on this thing, than they do playing with the drones I bought them. We need one for every adult and child, now. The wait time to hop on this thing is getting really long. They have even resorted to sharing, if you can even imagine two little boys sharing anything. ;) Swurfs up!

customer_reviews.title: Great swing, even better customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had issues with the wear of the first swing and the seller went above and beyond to make sure we were happy. Our whole family loves this swing and were happy with the seller's efforts to satisfy our disappointments with the wear. Would definitely purchase from this seller again! We've owned this swing for exactly 1 year.

customer_reviews.text: This is a fun swing but very slippery. My kids have slipped and fallen several times when trying to stand Ahmad "swurf." The box shows a non slip pad on the swing and double handles, but these are not actually included.

customer_reviews.title: It took longer than 20 minutes to hang and we ...
customer_reviews.text: It took longer than 20 minutes to hang and we needed extra rope in order to hang it from a strong enough branch to support a 10 and 12 year old

customer_reviews.text: The description said the rope is long enough to hang from a 20ft branch. Our branch is 16ft and the rope was too short.

customer_reviews.title: This swing is GREAT! The kids love using it as a normal ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm updating my review. We purchased the swing in April and the handle broke in September. With this type of swing once the handle breaks it is unsafe to use. I contacted this company to see if they would replace the handle and they would not. For 130.00$ swing I would expect a better product and much better customer service. This swing is GREAT! The kids love using it as a normal swing. Adults have a great time swinging normally or standing. I would highly recommend this swing if you're looking for something a little more adventurous than the typical swing.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Gardy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids and adults alike love this swing. Can be great exercise too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Swurfer - the Original Stand Up Surfing Swing - Curved Maple Wood Board To Easily Surf The Air
product_meta.description: Swinging is a quintessential playground pastime. The Swurfer, a handcrafted, American-Made, maple swing is designed for soaring through the air like a surfer on the waves. The Swurfer's simplicity masks it's functionality. It's great for exercising or just relaxing in the trees in either a sitting or standing position. The adjustable handles work for users of any height. It can support up to 200 lbs and includes plenty of high-strength rope that is UV and mildew resistant. The Swurfer is a carefree way to build your core and perfect your balance while swinging your cares away. Go ahead and find your soar spot!
feature_bullets: VERSATILE - Any child or adult can hop on and soar away; Adjustable handles for any height; Great for a little one looking for a calm swing and for big kids looking for excitement; Best for ages 6 and up

INNOVATIVE DESIGN - Unlike swings made of flat pieces of wood, Swurfer's unique, curved shape is engineered for more power, stability, and a wider range of motion; Each swingboard is individually shaped, sanded, and finished by hand for optimum quality
GREAT FOR ACTIVE PLAY - Swurfer is great for improving core body strength, balance, and toning leg and arm muscles; It's so much fun, you won't even realize what a workout you're getting!
EASY INSTALLATION - Sets up in minutes; Each Swurfer comes with easy-to-follow installation instructions and all necessary components
SPECIFICATIONS - Board measures 33 x 10 in; Includes 60-ft double braided, UV and mildew resistant rope; Supports up to 200 lbs
